languages.text: {n}Нет времени для раздумий! Вы выхватываете оружие и наводите ствол на Немезита, а он уже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Два черных дула смотрят друг на друга, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Времени на раздумья не остается. Вы выхватываете оружие и наводите ствол на Немезита, а он уже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Два черных дула смотрят друг на друга, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}

languages.text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нет времени для раздумий! Вы выхватываете оружие и наводите ствол на Немезита, а он уже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Два черных дула смотрят друг на друга, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin stretched over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin stretched over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

languages.text: {n}¡No hay tiempo para hablar! Desenfundas tu arma y diriges el cañón contra Nemesitio, pero él ya te está apuntando con una sonrisa malévola en su rostro. Los dos cañones negros se observan, y el mundo que te rodea se limita a una delgada línea.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}¡No hay tiempo para hablar! Desenfundas tu arma y diriges el cañón contra Nemesitio, pero él ya te está apuntando con una sonrisa malévola en su rostro. Los dos cañones negros se observan, y el mundo que te rodea se limita a una delgada línea.{/n}

languages.text: {n}細かい事を考える時間はない！あなたは武器を手に取り、ネメサイトに向けた。しかしネメサイトはすでに銃口をあなたに向けており、その顔には悪意に満ちた笑みが広がっている。二つのリボルバーの黒い銃口は、互いに見つめ合っている。あなたの周りの世界が、細い線の様に変わっていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}細かい事を考える時間はない！あなたは武器を手に取り、ネメサイトに向けた。しかしネメサイトはすでに銃口をあなたに向けており、その顔には悪意に満ちた笑みが広がっている。二つのリボルバーの黒い銃口は、互いに見つめ合っている。あなたの周りの世界が、細い線の様に変わっていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}已经没时间考虑了！你拔出武器，将枪管对准涅墨赛特，但他的枪口早已对准了你，脸上露出了恶毒的笑容。两把枪黑色的枪口对着彼此，你周围的世界缩成了一条细线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}已经没时间考虑了！你拔出武器，将枪管对准涅墨赛特，但他的枪口早已对准了你，脸上露出了恶毒的笑容。两把枪黑色的枪口对着彼此，你周围的世界缩成了一条细线。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zum Nachdenken ist keine Zeit! Du ziehst deine Waffe und richtest den Lauf auf Nemesit, aber er zielt bereits auf dich, das Gesicht verzerrt von einem bösartigen Grinsen. Die beiden schwarzen Mündungen starren einander an, und die Welt um dich herum verengt sich zu einer dünnen Linie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zum Nachdenken ist keine Zeit! Du ziehst deine Waffe und richtest den Lauf auf Nemesit, aber er zielt bereits auf dich, das Gesicht verzerrt von einem bösartigen Grinsen. Die beiden schwarzen Mündungen starren einander an, und die Welt um dich herum verengt sich zu einer dünnen Linie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pas le temps de tergiverser ! Vous dégainez votre arme et pointez le canon sur Némésite, mais celui-ci vous tient déjà en joue, un sourire malveillant aux lèvres. Les deux bouches noires se font face et le monde autour de vous se réduit à une simple ligne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pas le temps de tergiverser ! Vous dégainez votre arme et pointez le canon sur Némésite, mais celui-ci vous tient déjà en joue, un sourire malveillant aux lèvres. Les deux bouches noires se font face et le monde autour de vous se réduit à une simple ligne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ölçüp biçecek vakit yok! Silahını çekip namluyu Nemezit'e doğrultuyorsun. Nemezit ise suratına yayılan kindar sırıtış eşliğinde silahını hâlihazırda sana doğrultmuş. İki siyah ağız birbirine bakıyor ve etrafını saran dünya, incecik bir çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and point the barrel at Nemesite, but he is already aiming his own at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The two black muzzles stare into each other, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}
